column4: depending on the effects enabled, Beryl actually lowered CPU usage for me
XGL  ... i can't use aiglx with the fglrx driver (ATI Mobility X1300)
ah, I use aiglx, so YMMV (XGL had tons of java swing issues for me, that were showstopping)
yeah until ATI comes out with a driver that supports my card - I'm stuck with fglrx and XGL for beryl ...which pretty much burns a hole in my CPU and leaks memmory pretty quick
